colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,CES SKYER SGANG PA LUGS KYI RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SGRUB THABS BGEGS DPUG KUN 'JOMS ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG DAD PA DANG GTONG BA DANG SHES RAB DANG, RNAM DPYOD SOGS DAM PAS BSNGAGS PA'I YON TAN DANG LDAN PA, SKAL BZANG MGON PO DBANG GI RGYAL POS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES NAN GYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, CHOS SMRA BA'I BTZUN PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS LHUN POR 'PHRAL DU SBYAR BA'O, ,
